slurm.usage:
To run this script using slurm, use the following command:
`sbatch <script_name> <options>`

mpirun.usage: The script uses mpirun to run the magpie commands on each node.  It is expected to be installed on all nodes.

python.usage: The script uses python to run Ray jobs, and it is expected to be installed on all nodes.

ray.usage: This script depends on ray to run ray jobs. It is expected to be installed on all nodes.

magpie.usage: This script is a part of magpie, and it is expected to be installed on all nodes.

shared_filesystem.usage: This script requires a shared filesystem that is mounted on all nodes. This allows magpie to store scripts and other data that are needed on each node.

local_scratch_space.usage: This script requires a local scratch space on each node. This is used to store temporary files.
